verses.name: Mark 6:36
verses.text: Send them away, that they may go into the country round about, and into the villages, and buy themselves bread: for they have nothing to eat.

verses.name: Mark 6:37
verses.text: He answered and said unto them, Give ye them to eat. And they say unto him, Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread, and give them to eat?

verses.name: Mark 6:38
verses.text: He saith unto them, How many loaves have ye? go and see. And when they knew, they say, Five, and two fishes.

verses.name: Mark 6:39
verses.text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass.
